files.name: root.html.twig
trigger.html.twig
files.content:
<button {{ attributes.add(stimulus_target('ui--accordion', 'trigger')).add(stimulus_action('ui--accordion', 'toggle', 'click')).without('class') }}
        type="button" aria-expanded="false"
        data-state="closed"
        class="{{ [attributes.render('class') ?? 'w-full flex flex-1 items-center w-full justify-between py-4 text-sm font-medium transition-all hover:underline [&[data-state=open]>span>svg]:rotate-180']| tailwind_merge }}"
>
    {% block content %}{% endblock %}
</button>

files.content: {% props variant = 'default', size = 'md' %} {% set badgeVariants = cva({ base: 'inline-flex items-center rounded-md border px-2 py-0.5 font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2', variants: { variant: { default: "border-primary bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/80", secondary:"border-transparent bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80", destructive:"text-destructive border-destructive/50 bg-destructive/10 hover:bg-destructive/20", outline: "text-foreground hover:bg-foreground/5", success: "text-success border-success/50 bg-success/10 hover:bg-success/20", warning: "text-warning border-warning/50 bg-warning/10 hover:bg-warning/20", slate: "text-slate-500 border-slate-500/50 bg-slate-500/10 hover:bg-slate-500/20", gray: "text-gray-500 border-gray-500/50 bg-gray-500/10 hover:bg-gray-500/20", zinc: "text-zinc-500 border-zinc-500/50 bg-zinc-500/10 hover:bg-zinc-500/20", neutral: "text-neutral-500 border-neutral-500/50 bg-neutral-500/10 hover:bg-neutral-500/20", stone: "text-stone-500 border-stone-500/50 bg-stone-500/10 hover:bg-stone-500/20", red: "text-red-500 border-red-500/50 bg-red-500/10 hover:bg-red-500/20", orange: "text-orange-500 border-orange-500/50 bg-orange-500/10 hover:bg-orange-500/20", amber: "text-amber-500 border-amber-500/50 bg-amber-500/10 hover:bg-amber-500/20", yellow: "text-yellow-500 border-yellow-500/50 bg-yellow-500/10 hover:bg-yellow-500/20", lime: "text-lime-500 border-lime-500/50 bg-lime-500/10 hover:bg-lime-500/20", green: "text-green-500 border-green-500/50 bg-green-500/10 hover:bg-green-500/20", emerald: "text-emerald-500 border-emerald-500/50 bg-emerald-500/10 hover:bg-emerald-500/20", teal: "text-teal-500 border-teal-500/50 bg-teal-500/10 hover:bg-teal-500/20", cyan: "text-cyan-500 border-cyan-500/50 bg-cyan-500/10 hover:bg-cyan-500/20", sky: "text-sky-500 border-sky-500/50 bg-sky-500/10 hover:bg-sky-500/20", blue: "text-blue-500 border-blue-500/50 bg-blue-500/10 hover:bg-blue-500/20", indigo: "text-indigo-500 border-indigo-500/50 bg-indigo-500/10 hover:bg-indigo-500/20", violet: "text-violet-500 border-violet-500/50 bg-violet-500/10 hover:bg-violet-500/20", purple: "text-purple-500 border-purple-500/50 bg-purple-500/10 hover:bg-purple-500/20", fuchsia: "text-fuchsia-500 border-fuchsia-500/50 bg-fuchsia-500/10 hover:bg-fuchsia-500/20", pink: "text-pink-500 border-pink-500/50 bg-pink-500/10 hover:bg-pink-500/20", rose: "text-rose-500 border-rose-500/50 bg-rose-500/10 hover:bg-rose-500/20", }, size: { sm: "h-4 text-xs", md: "h-6 py-0.5 text-xs", lg: "h-8 text-sm", xl: "h-10 text-base", } }, defaultVariants: { variant: "default", size: "md" }, }) %} {% block content %}{% endblock %}

files.name: collapsible_controller.js
default.html.twig
files.content:
<input{{ attributes.add(stimulus_controller('ui--input')).without('class') }}
        class="{{ ['flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 file:pt-[3px]', attributes.render('class') ?? ''] | tailwind_merge }}">

files.name: textarea.html.twig
files.content: <textarea{{ attributes.add(stimulus_controller('ui--input')).without('class') }} class="{{ ['flex min-h-[60px] w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm shadow-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50', attributes.render('class')] |tailwind_merge }}">{% block content %}{% endblock %}</textarea>
